performIncrementColumnValue

public static long performIncrementColumnValue(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTableInterface hTable,
                                               byte[] row,
                                               byte[] columnFamily,
                                               byte[] identifier,
                                               long amount)
Execute incrementColumnValue

Parameters:
row - The row that contains the cell to increment.
columnFamily - The column family of the cell to increment.
identifier - The column qualifier of the cell to increment.
amount - The amount to increment the cell with (or decrement, if the amount is negative).
Returns:
The new value, post increment.
